text: 11:19 Onger Akaba 51:10; Jeremaia 31:33; 32:39; Sekaraia 7:1211:19-20 Esekiel 36:26-28Eghtɨ kɨ me damutɨ, me navir vamɨran ikiam. Kɨ duar igiam isɨ men navir averiabar atɨgham. Faragha men navir averiaba dagɨabar mɨn bar gavgafi. Eghtɨ kɨ men navir averiabar amutɨ, da amɨraghamɨregh na gifuegh na baghvɨra ikiam.
